files.description: CLI runner that loads exemplar URLs from case-study JSON files, checks them (status/redirects), and writes runtime/outputs/qa/linkcheck_report.json and runtime/outputs/qa/LINKCHECK_SUMMARY.md.
Core link-check library providing URL extraction from case-study JSON, HTTP checking logic (redirect chains, timeouts, retries), and report/summary generation helpers.
Dataclasses and type definitions for link-check inputs/outputs to keep report schema consistent and easy to validate.
Filesystem utilities for discovering case-study JSON files, reading/writing the report JSON, and emitting the Markdown summary under runtime/outputs/qa.
Shared user-agent and polite request defaults (headers, rate limiting settings) used by the link-check runner.
Validation script that checks linkcheck_report.json schema basics and ensures LINKCHECK_SUMMARY.md exists and references the same totals.
Placeholder file ensuring the QA outputs directory exists in the repository for link-check artifacts.
Documentation describing how to run the link-check runner, expected inputs, report schema, and troubleshooting for network/redirect issues.

missionDescription: Implement a link-check runner that reads exemplar URLs from case-study JSON and writes results to `runtime/outputs/qa/linkcheck_report.json` (status codes, redirects, last-checked timestamp) and a human-readable summary `runtime/outputs/qa/LINKCHECK_SUMMARY.md`.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Adds automated integrity checks for exemplar URLs (reachability + timestamps), reducing silent decay and ensuring the media catalog/case studies remain verifiable without downloading copyrighted mater...
